message.content:
cs.DC, cs.DB, cs.DS, cs.NI, cs.SE 

The paper discusses the implementation of a Big Data/Extreme Computing (BDEC) capable system infrastructure for Exascale computing, which involves storing and processing immense volumes of data. This suggests that the paper could belong to the Distributed, Parallel, and Cluster Computing (cs.DC) sub-category. Additionally, the paper addresses the increasing overlaps between Big Data Analysis and HPC, which could place it in the Databases (cs.DB) and Data Structures and Algorithms (cs.DS) sub-categories. The paper also mentions the use of sensors and scientific instruments, which could suggest a connection to the Networking and Internet Architecture (cs.NI) sub-category. Finally, the paper discusses the software architecture of the SAGE system, which could place it in the Software Engineering (cs.SE) sub-category.
